name: Pikochan
description:
This is a tribute to old arcade game such as Popeye or Donkey Kong.

You play as pikochan (inpired bu nikochan from Dr Slump). You must collect pink and golden poop (also inspired by Dr Slump ^^ ). Avoid boulder and use elevator through 8 levels.

The code is fully commented and you can easily tweek/add levels of your own.

Have a nice game!
